Title: Live and Let Fly
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Rich Rinaldi
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: The Belcher kids' revenge plan against the school counselor gets them involved in a sibling rivalry between two pilots. Meanwhile Teddy invites Bob and Linda to a paper airplane contest.
